summary: Adds a new, lore-friendly set of Blades style armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
==========
Description
==========
This mod adds a standalone set of Blades style armor to the game. It can be aquired from a chest in Esbern\'s vault in the Ratway. It\'s stats should be similar to Blades Armor. It is now improvable at a workbench.

======
Update
======
-Fixed the ground model of the gloves
-The armor is now ACTUALLY temperable at a workbench
-The armor supports beast races
-The armor (partially) supports females (male mesh on female body)

============
Requirements
============
-Skyrim
-Fur Hoods HD by Northborn

==========
Installation
==========
Download with NMM and activate in mods list (recommended)
or...
Extract contents to Data folder

============
Uninstallation
============
Deactivate with NMM (recommended)
or...
Delete: meshes/armor/BladesExile
textures/armor/BladesExile
ExiledBladesArmor.esp

==========
Permissions
==========
ALWAYS ask me before you use any bit of this mod in your own mod. Should permission be granted, all I ask for in return is a \"thank you\" and credit where credit is due.

=============
Important Note
=============
Please know that I CAN\'T MODEL FOR CRAP!!! The best I can do is some minor editing with GIMP. So don\'t ask me to remodel anything because I can\'t.

======
Credits
======
My Mind for coming up with this idea
KaptTorbjorn for creating the armor for me
Tumbajumba for the original scarf model and texture
Northborn for the fur hood
Omesean for the amazing Einherjar gloves which I used for this armor
Bethesda for making Skyrim and the Creation kit
GIMP makers for GIMP
Nifskope makers for Nifskope

Enjoy!
author: Hatwig and KaptTorbjorn
